issue.title: [Doc] Provide Java development guide
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10107](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10107). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need a document to help developers with development related issues.
